name: FTimeTableStop
comment: A stop entry in the time table.

name: AFGRailroadTimeTable
comment: Object containing a trains time table and where it is right now.

methods.name: AddStop
methods.comment: Add a stop to the time table.

methods.name: RemoveStop
methods.comment: Remove a stop from the time table.

methods.name: GetStops
methods.comment: Get all stops in the time table.

methods.name: SetStops
methods.comment: Set all stops in the time table.

methods.name: IsValidStop
methods.comment:
Is the index a valid stop.
Checks if the index is valid and the 'Stop' actor is valid.

methods.name: GetStop
methods.comment:
Get the given stop.
@return The stop at index, valid or invalid. If the index is invalid it returns an empty stop.

methods.name: GetCurrentStop
methods.comment: @return Current stop the train is at or heading to.

methods.name: SetCurrentStop
methods.comment: @param index Set the stop the train is heading to.

methods.name: IncrementCurrentStop
methods.comment: Increment the current stop to the next one in order.

properties.name: mStops
properties.comment: Array of destinations this train will visit.

properties.name: mCurrentStop
properties.comment: Current stop the train is at or heading to.
